sharingOwnerRules.description: Share "Product Items" with MSN Field Crew. This is required in order to enable a field crew user to "unconsume" (=delete) a Product Consumed record in case they inadvertently consumed a wrong part.
sharingOwnerRules.label: MSN - Field Crew - Read/Write Access to Product Items

sharingOwnerRules.description: Share "Product Items" with MSN Job Coordinators. This is required in order to enable a Job Coordinator user to add or remove "Products Consumed" records to add missing or remove incorrect parts.
sharingOwnerRules.label: MSN Job Coordinator - Write Access to Product Items
